When.1: I will respond to your request as soon as possible

Welcomeblogtext.1: Every word that the angels convey to us comes to us as a gift of wisdom and learning. Enjoy reading and take for your life what resonates in your heart.

Bien_Quote.1: Light is our virtue, patience our way, and love our religion.

Bien_Info1.1: Every life experience, every event and each person we meet, has the beautiful mission of helping us grow,learn and evolve. Angels are here to accompany you during this wonderful journey, creating a path of understanding and love that leads to healing and transformation.

Sobre_Quote.1: ... to help others to find themselves and heal their lives through contact with angels and archangels.

Sobre_FirstP.1: I always wondered about what was beyond humanity and the world we know, and it was through my constant search that I came to understand and know more about human existence.

Sobre_About1.1: By heeding their messages, following their paths of unconditional love and above all, accepting their guidance to heal myself, my life mission was revealed to me: To help others meet themselves and heal their lives through the contact with angels and archangels.

Sobre_About2.1: I opened my practice in 2005 and since then my work with these wonderful teachers has not stopped. They have been my guides, my companions and my teachers in this process of personal transformation.

Sobre_SecondP.1: Thanks to them today I can invite you to live the loving experience of contacting your angels through me, to transform, heal and balance your life.

Terap_TerapiaAngeles.1: Angel therapy is a healing tool in which through contact and messages from angels and archangels you will be able to understand the purpose of all life experiences that you go through, and have gone through throughout your existence...

Terap_TerapiaAngelesMore.1: Angel therapy is a healing tool in which through contact and messages from angels and archangels you will be able to understand the purpose of all life experiences that you go through, and have gone through throughout your existence. In the same way, the angels and archangels bring to your life the possibility of knowing and transforming you through their advice and words, always surrounded by the most infinite universal love. The presence and contact with these wonderful beings is an experience of peace, harmony and well-being .

Terap_Meditaciones.1: Through the channeling of angels and archangels I accompany you to perform meditations focused on healing particular issues...

Terap_MeditacionesMore.1: Through the channeling of angels and archangels I accompany you to perform meditations focused on healing particular issues. The angelic masters take us through personalized meditations focused on your needs for healing and emotional release, entering into subtle frequencies that allow you to connect and communicate with your inner self.

Terap_Constelaciones.1: Family Constellations is a therapeutic tool that allows you to look, understand and heal the situation you want to treat through its unconscious representation...

Terap_ConstelacionesMore.1: Family Constellations is a therapeutic tool that allows you to look, understand and heal the situation you wish to treat through its unconscious representation. It allows you to know and understand hidden family and ancestral patterns, so that by making them conscious you have the possibility of taking alternative and creative paths for you and your life experience.

Terap_Tarot.1: Healing tool in which through the use of tarot you can connect with your unconscious contents and bring them back for their recognition and work with your being...

Terap_TarotMore.1: Healing tool in which through the use of tarot you can connect with your unconscious contents and bring them back for their recognition and work with your being. The tarot, through its cards, allows you to identify different archetypes through which patterns, beliefs and unconscious wounds are revealed to allow you to carry out a healing and awakening therapeutic process. Tarot with its symbolism allows you to recognize your enormous transformative capacity and gives you the opportunity to apply it to your daily reality.
